DOC.brief_summary: This feasibility study evaluates acceptability and preliminary effectiveness of a digital health game as an intervention supporting tobacco-related health literacy in 10- to 13-year-old early adolescents. One third of the study participants will receive the health game, on third a web page with similar content and one third will act as a control group without intervention.
DOC.brief_title: Digital Health Game as an Intervention Supporting Tobacco-related Health Literacy in Early Adolescents
DOC.criteria: Goes to school at 4th, 5th or 6th grade Understands and can communicate either in Finnish, Swedish or English Has daily access to either a smart phone or tablet computer during free time Takes part to specialized education
